item.title: Corrective Measure
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. The Corrective Measure is a 450 RPM Adaptive Frame Machine Gun that drops in the Vault of Glass (Confluxes, Templar and Atheon). That is the reason why Corrective Measure is one of my favorite Machine Guns of all time, because it bridges the gap of two of the best builds I like to use. … The Corrective Measure is the perfect Machine Gun and I don’t think it will ever be surpassed - Ehroar

item.title: Corrective Measure (Timelost)
Fatebringer
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Fatebringer is a 140 RPM hand cannon, back in a reprised version from Destiny 1 via the Vault of Glass. It drops from either the Templar or Gatekeeper encounters. Once acquired, it will also drop from either of the two secret chests and can be acquired from the post-Atheon chest for Spoils of Conquest x 20. We’re going with recommendations on this heavily influenced by Fallout’s review.

item.title: Fatebringer (Timelost)
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. This is the “Timelost” (or “Adept”) version of this weapon, which drops only by completing the Conflux encounter Challenge in Vault of Glass on Master mode. Once obtained, you can spend Spoils of Conquest for random rolls after defeating Atheon in Master mode. The rolls here are the same as the normal version. Fatebringer, Timelost Edition: Bonus Third Column Perk: Explosive Payload * Bonus Fourth Column Perk: Firefly * Can slot Adept mods!

Hezen Vengeance
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Hezen Vengeance is a 25 RPM Aggressive Frame Rocket Launcher that drops in the Vault of Glass from the Gatekeeper or Atheon encounters. It’s the only Rocket Launcher in the game currently that can roll with Overflow which makes it a DPS monster. PvE Thoughts A few highlights from Ehroar’s review combined with highlights from Rustopholis' video on Rocket Launcher perks in general.
